remarks: Addition formula for Y sequence.  Equation 2.8 of [JonesMatijasevic] p. 695.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Sep-2014.)
statement: rmyadd $p |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY ( M + N ) ) = ( ( ( A rmY M ) x. ( A rmX N ) ) + ( ( A rmX M ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) ) $.
